text: Another Windows handheld is declared to be "the best", resulting in Ticci selling his Legion Go
full-pick-text: Another Windows handheld is declared to be "the best", resulting in Ticci selling his Legion Go
notes: • With no rules against half-points, the fact that Federico has kept but repurposed his Legion Go as a SteamOS device and no longer considers it "the best" gets partial credit.
